title: Made to be...Obedient
description: Reprogrammed -- to be submissive to two men!Van and Tony had saved their friend Autumn's life when they brought her to St. Austin's hospital. But the sinister Dr. Steyn had redesigned her to be prettier, sexier, and totally submissive.Now Autumn's two best guy friends can ask her to do anything, and she'll comply -- willingly and enthusiastically!
author: Mecha Dahl
